changelog.change_log:
We have some exciting news to share with you all! Our upcoming update is just around the corner, and we wanted to give you a sneak peek at what's coming. Here's a rundown of the changelog:

- Updated mobs: We have improved the textures, models, and animations of various mobs in the game. This will enhance their visual quality and make them more immersive.

- Bug fixes and improvements: We have addressed several bugs reported by our players and made general improvements to enhance the overall gameplay experience. This will ensure a smoother and more enjoyable gaming experience.

- New Western location: We are introducing a brand new Western-themed location for players to explore. This new area will bring a fresh and exciting atmosphere to the game, with unique challenges and rewards.

- Smooth turn: We have added a new feature that allows players to activate smooth turn in the settings. This will provide a more seamless and comfortable turning experience during gameplay.

- Balance Improvement: We have made adjustments to the game's balance, taking into account player feedback and suggestions. This will ensure a more fair and balanced gameplay experience for all players.

We hope you enjoy these updates and look forward to your continued support!
